scripts.jekyll: cd public && JEKYLL_ENV=development bundle exec jekyll serve -l -o
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd vite && APP_ENV=development vite dev" "cd public && JEKYLL_ENV=development bundle exec jekyll serve -l -o"
scripts.build: cd vite && vite build && cd ../public && mv dist/manifest.json _data/manifest.json && rm -rf assets && mv dist/assets assets && bundle exec jekyll build
